name: PONG'D!
description:
CONTROLS

  1. Mouse to move paddle
  2. Left click to change colours

PRO TIP: faster is not always better

Beat your opponent by scoring goals against them!  Join together the colour of the ball and your paddle to get some insane speed!

This is my entry to the 2021 GMTK game jam with the theme of "joined together". 

CREDITS

  • Music and SFX: freesound
  • Logo: macrovector
